content.full_text: This code indicates that a patient has tested positive for HIV but has manifested no signs or symptoms of the disease. (Evidence: pg no: 94, L41)
content.summary: Z21 indicates positive HIV test without disease signs or symptoms (Evidence: pg no: 94, L41)
key_concepts: Positive HIV test (Evidence: pg no: 94, L41)
No signs or symptoms (Evidence: pg no: 94, L41)

detailed_rules.rule_text: Use when patient tests positive for HIV but has no signs or symptoms (Evidence: pg no: 94, L41)
detailed_rules.explanation: Z21 is specifically for patients with confirmed HIV infection who remain asymptomatic (Evidence: pg no: 94, L41)

workflow_steps: Step 1: Confirm positive HIV test results
Step 2: Verify absence of HIV-related signs and symptoms
